Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<java.lang.String>
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUI
public abstract class View
extends Observable<java.lang.String>
View is the user interface, that can be graphical or command-line
